description: This class provides APIs to all of the registers of the TI BQ24295 battery charger chip, as used on the u-blox C030 board. This class is not required to charge a battery connected to the C030 board, charging will begin automatically when a battery is connected. This class is only required if the user wishes to monitor the charger's state or change the charger's settings.
name: battery-charger-bq24295
